page.title: 08Employment in Elsworth
page.content:
There is very little opportunity for employment within the village apart from a small engineering unit. Most wage earners are professional people and work in Cambridge. A small number of families rely on the farms for employment.
There is a number of small (in some cases one-man) businesses such as landscaping, thatching, plumbing, hairdressing and various consultancies. In many households both husband and wife are wage-earners; a small number of wives do domestic work, but again most commute.
